notes: Character consistency is the most challenging aspect. Hair color, eye color, and facial features must remain stable. Some variance in exact facial geometry during head turn is acceptable.

expectedResults.description: Character identity should remain recognizably the same person throughout the video
expectedResults.primaryConcern: Hair color and style must not change
expectedResults.secondaryConcern: Facial features should remain consistent even during head rotation
expectedResults.acceptableVariance: Minor changes in expression, slight variations in freckle pattern
